DESCRIPTION: Setup or update the trading card module.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}setcapture arenaofvalor [#Channel]** ~ Set the card game for Arena of Valor game.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}setcapture mobilelegends [#Channel]** ~ Set the card game for Mobile Legends Bang Bang game.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}setcapture rulesofsurvival [#Channel]** ~ Set the card game for Rules of Survival game.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: **{{prefix}}setcapture baseball [#Channel]** ~ Set the card game for Baseball game.
ALIASES: Setcapture does not have any aliases
INVALID_GAME: The game you entered is not a valid game. The valid games are {{validGames}}.
CHANNEL_SETUP: The game channel has been successfully setup.
ALREADY_SET: This channel is already set as the game channel.
CHANNEL_UPDATED: The game channel has been successfully updated.
NOT_SETUP: You can not reset this game's trading cards because it has not setup yet.
RESET: This game's trading cards has been disabled.
